newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU says Brazil restricting stainless steel imports.
newsitem.headline: EU says Brazil restricting stainless steel imports.

text.p: The European Commission said Friday it opened an investigation into allegations that Brazil was restricting imports of stainless steel flat products.

It said in a statement that Eurofer, the European Confederation of Iron and Steel Industries, had claimed that Brazil was refusing to issue import licences unless goods are paid for within 30 days rather than the 180-day commercial norm.
Eurofer had charged that this was making it impossible for importers to sell on credit and impeding their access to financing, the Commission said.
The annual loss to European Union industry was a potential 35 million European currency units ($39 million), the statement said.
